   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(inets_sup_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   27: -compile(export_all).
   28: 
   29: suite() -> 
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   31:      {timetrap,{seconds, 10}}
   32:     ].
   33: 
   34: all() -> 
   35:     [default_tree, httpd_config, httpd_subtree, httpd_subtree_profile,
   36:      httpc_subtree].
   37: 
   38: groups() -> 
   39:     [].
   40: 
   41: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_) ->
   51:     inets:stop(),
   52:     ok.
   53: 
   54: init_per_testcase(httpd_config = TC, Config) ->
   55:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   56:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, TC),
   57:     ok = file:make_dir(Dir),
   58: 
   59:     FallbackConfig = [{port, 0},
   60: 		      {server_name,"www.test"},
   61: 		      {modules, [mod_get]},
   62: 		      {server_root, Dir},
   63: 		      {document_root, Dir},
   64: 		      {bind_address, any},
   65: 		      {ipfamily, inet6fb4}],
   66:     try
   67: 	inets:stop(),
   68: 	inets:start(),
   69: 	inets:start(httpd, FallbackConfig),
   70: 	Config
   71:     catch
   72: 	_:Reason ->
   73: 	    inets:stop(),
   74: 	    exit({failed_starting_inets, Reason})
   75:     end;
   76: 
   77: init_per_testcase(httpd_subtree = TC, Config) ->
   78:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 			   
   79:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, TC),
   80:     ok = file:make_dir(Dir),
   81: 
   82:     SimpleConfig  = [{port, 0},
   83: 		     {server_name,"www.test"},
   84: 		     {modules, [mod_get]},
   85: 		     {server_root, Dir},
   86: 		     {document_root, Dir},
   87: 		     {bind_address, any},
   88: 		     {ipfamily, inet}],
   89:     try
   90: 	inets:stop(),
   91: 	inets:start(),
   92: 	inets:start(httpd, SimpleConfig),
   93: 	Config
   94:     catch
   95: 	_:Reason ->
   96: 	    inets:stop(),
   97: 	    exit({failed_starting_inets, Reason})
   98:     end;
   99: 
  100: init_per_testcase(httpd_subtree_profile = TC, Config) ->
  101:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 			   
  102:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, TC),
  103:     ok = file:make_dir(Dir),
  104: 
  105:     SimpleConfig  = [{port, 0},
  106: 		     {server_name,"www.test"},
  107: 		     {modules, [mod_get]},
  108: 		     {server_root, Dir},
  109: 		     {document_root, Dir},
  110: 		     {bind_address, any},
  111: 		     {profile, test_profile},
  112: 		     {ipfamily, inet}],
  113:     try
  114: 	inets:stop(),
  115: 	inets:start(),
  116: 	{ok, _} = inets:start(httpd, SimpleConfig),
  117: 	Config
  118:     catch
  119: 	_:Reason ->
  120: 	    inets:stop(),
  121: 	    exit({failed_starting_inets, Reason})
  122:     end;
  123:      
  124: 
  125: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  126:     inets:stop(),
  127:     ok = inets:start(),
  128:     Config.
  129: 
  130: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == httpd_subtree;
  131: 				    Case == httpd_subtree_profile ->
  132:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 	
  133:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, "root"),
  134:     inets_test_lib:del_dirs(Dir),
  135:     ok;
  136: 
  137: end_per_testcase(_, _) ->
  138:     inets:stop(),
  139:     ok.
  140: 
  141: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  142: %% Test cases starts here.
  143: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  144: default_tree() ->
  145:     [{doc, "Makes sure the correct processes are started and linked," 
  146:       "in the default case."}].
  147: default_tree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  148:     TopSupChildren = supervisor:which_children(inets_sup),
  149:     2 = length(TopSupChildren),
  150:     {value, {httpd_sup, _, supervisor,[httpd_sup]}} =
  151: 	lists:keysearch(httpd_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  152:     {value, {httpc_sup, _,supervisor,[httpc_sup]}} = 
  153: 	lists:keysearch(httpc_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  154: 
  155:     HttpcSupChildren = supervisor:which_children(httpc_sup),
  156:     {value, {httpc_profile_sup,_, supervisor, [httpc_profile_sup]}} =
  157: 	lists:keysearch(httpc_profile_sup, 1, HttpcSupChildren),
  158:     {value, {httpc_handler_sup,_, supervisor, [httpc_handler_sup]}} =
  159: 	lists:keysearch(httpc_handler_sup, 1, HttpcSupChildren),
  160:     
  161:     [] = supervisor:which_children(httpd_sup),
  162:  
  163:     %% Default profile
  164:     [{httpc_manager, _, worker,[httpc_manager]}]
  165: 	= supervisor:which_children(httpc_profile_sup),
  166:     
  167:     [] = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
  168: 
  169:     ok.
  170: 
  171: httpd_config() ->
  172:     [{doc, "Makes sure the httpd config works for inet6fb4."}].
  173: httpd_config(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     do_httpd_subtree(Config, default).
  175: 
  176: httpd_subtree() ->
  177:     [{doc, "Makes sure the httpd sub tree is correct."}].
  178: httpd_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  179:     do_httpd_subtree(Config, default).
  180: 
  181: httpd_subtree_profile(doc) ->
  182:     ["Makes sure the httpd sub tree is correct when using a profile"]; 
  183: httpd_subtree_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     do_httpd_subtree(Config, test_profile).
  185: 
  186: httpc_subtree() ->
  187:     [{doc, "Makes sure the httpd sub tree is correct."}]. 
  188: httpc_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  189:     {ok, Foo} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, foo}]),
  190: 
  191:     {ok, Bar} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, bar}], stand_alone),
  192: 
  193:     HttpcChildren = supervisor:which_children(httpc_profile_sup),
  194: 
  195:     {value, {httpc_manager, _, worker, [httpc_manager]}} =
  196: 	lists:keysearch(httpc_manager, 1, HttpcChildren),
  197: 
  198:     {value,{{httpc,foo}, _Pid, worker, [httpc_manager]}} = 
  199: 	lists:keysearch({httpc, foo}, 1, HttpcChildren),
  200:     false = lists:keysearch({httpc, bar}, 1, HttpcChildren),
  201:     
  202:     inets:stop(httpc, Foo),
  203:     exit(Bar, normal).
  204: 
  205: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  206: %% Internal functions
  207: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  208: 
  209: verify_child(Parent, Child, Type) ->
  210:     Children = supervisor:which_children(Parent),
  211:     verify_child(Children, Parent, Child, Type).
  212: 
  213: verify_child([], Parent, Child, _Type) ->
  214:     {error, {child_not_found, Child, Parent}};
  215: verify_child([{Id, _Pid, Type2, Mods}|Children], Parent, Child, Type) ->
  216:     case lists:member(Child, Mods) of
  217: 	true when (Type2 =:= Type) ->
  218: 	    {ok, Id};
  219: 	true when (Type2 =/= Type) ->
  220: 	    {error, {wrong_type, Type2, Child, Parent}};
  221: 	false ->
  222: 	    verify_child(Children, Parent, Child, Type)
  223:     end.
  224: 
  225: do_httpd_subtree(_Config, Profile) ->
  226:    %% Check that we have the httpd top supervisor
  227:     {ok, _} = verify_child(inets_sup, httpd_sup, supervisor),
  228: 
  229:     %% Check that we have the httpd instance supervisor
  230:     {ok, Id} = verify_child(httpd_sup, httpd_instance_sup, supervisor),
  231:     {httpd_instance_sup, Addr, Port, Profile} = Id,
  232:     Instance = httpd_util:make_name("httpd_instance_sup", Addr, Port, Profile),
  233:     
  234:     %% Check that we have the expected httpd instance children
  235:     {ok, _} = verify_child(Instance, httpd_connection_sup, supervisor),
  236:     {ok, _} = verify_child(Instance, httpd_acceptor_sup, supervisor),
  237:     {ok, _} = verify_child(Instance, httpd_misc_sup, supervisor),
  238:     {ok, _} = verify_child(Instance, httpd_manager, worker),
  239: 
  240:     %% Check that the httpd instance acc supervisor has children
  241:     InstanceAcc = httpd_util:make_name("httpd_acceptor_sup", Addr, Port, Profile),
  242:     case supervisor:which_children(InstanceAcc) of
  243: 	[_ | _] -> 
  244: 	    ok;
  245: 	InstanceAccUnexpectedChildren ->
  246: 	    exit({unexpected_children, 
  247: 		  InstanceAcc, InstanceAccUnexpectedChildren})
  248:     end,
  249:     
  250:     %% Check that the httpd instance misc supervisor has no children
  251:     io:format("httpd_subtree -> verify misc~n", []),
  252:     InstanceMisc = httpd_util:make_name("httpd_misc_sup", Addr, Port, Profile),
  253:     case supervisor:which_children(InstanceMisc) of
  254: 	[] ->
  255: 	    ok;
  256: 	InstanceMiscUnexpectedChildren ->
  257: 	    exit({unexpected_children, 
  258: 		  InstanceMisc, InstanceMiscUnexpectedChildren})
  259:     end,
  260:     io:format("httpd_subtree -> done~n", []),
  261:     ok.
